Open Close VillageMilk.in is an app to subscribe Milk and other farm based products from farmers directly. We are currently open in Gachibowli, Hitech city, Ayyappa Society, Jubilee Hills of Hyderabad. Your bill gets updated everyday after your supplies have been delivered. You need to have a positive balance to ensure continued services. Flash Sales are only for a limited time, till stocks last. Order now and get the product tomorrow. You can subscribe to an item to be delivered tomorrow before 12am. The item will be delivered to you between 6am and 8am, except for special productArrayList like Water Cans. You need to have a positive balance to ensure continued services, Please add money to your wallet now. Thanks. You will receive the product as per schedule! Sorry! No internet connectivity.
